Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI provided feedback seemed more automated or sometimes it even failed to give a response citing it as one of its limitations

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Yes , I felt that the feedback my teacher gave was much more specific and tailored to the needs of my own work and the learning outcomes that aligned with the subject but AI gave only a broad and generalized output.
